Resource.name: BOELinesService
Resource.Summary: This API enables you to invoke the interfaces defined on 'BOELinesService'.

Function.Description: Invoke the method 'GetBOELine' on this service by specifying the payload 'BOELineParams' in the JSON format.

DataTypes.Description: The 'DataTypes' defines the types referenced by the 'Functions'. It is only for QA, not for info dev.
